Overview

The site is an online post-board helping to connecting tutors/ mentors with students. While I was taking some programming courses I found out some learning path problem. I decide to create web application to solve those problems. Once student and teacher are connected they have to meet in person to run a class. Tutors can create content based on academic topics or a hobby.

Role

Product Design, Research, front-end development

Collaborators

Liudas Sodonis

Goal

There are many skill-share like sites, but there is no site to find tutors or mentors who teach in person. Especially for beginners, it's hard to describe problems they are facing. I remember when I was in University there was post boards in a school to find tutors. The main goal of the site is help people to find tutors or mentors via online post-board site.

Students
  • Learn without restrictions
  • Choose level of learning
Tutors/ Mentors
  • Earn money using their skill
  • Easy to open a class
Both
  • Easy to connect
  • Flexibility

Problems

Find problems academy school and online courses

Meet up

Hard to find 1:1 mentor

School

Academic schools are expensive and college only provide the day time classes

Online Courses

Some online courses are not accurate and hard to follow. For example learning programming - software and tools are frequently updated so explanations in video gets outdated.

Online Courses

Something is breaking or not working as expected. Then it's good to have a person to ask questions.

Scope of work and timeline

Similar websites & Keywords

To do bench marketing, start from researching similar websites to understand the trendy layout and the content. Also, researched keywords from other education websites using Google.

Persona - Target Market

Smooth and intuitive site flow

Wireframe

Prototype
